Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the model for the Connect Five board.
    Author:
    Edgar Padilla, Oscar Galindo, Mario Delgado

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(int size)
      Default constructor

      void addDisk(int x, int y)
      Adds a disc to the game board.

      Provides a copy to the solicitor of the array that represents player1's board

      Provides a copy to the solicitor of the array that represents AI's board

      Returns the number of disks in the game board.
      int getStatus()
      Reports the status after attempting to add a disc.

      Reports if a positions that is being checked was already used by player 1
      boolean player2Use(int coord_x, int coord_y)
      Reports if a positions that is being checked was already used by player 2

    • Method Detail

      • addDisk

        public void addDisk(int x,
                    int y)
        Adds a disc to the game board.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of where the disk needs to be placed.
        y - y coordinate of where the disk needs to be placed.

      • aiAnalysisArray

        public boolean[][] aiAnalysisArray()
        Provides a copy to the solicitor of the array that represents player1's board
        Returns:
        boolean[][] player1Copy that represents player1's board.

      • aiArray

        public boolean[][] aiArray()
        Provides a copy to the solicitor of the array that represents AI's board
        Returns:
        boolean[][] player2Copy that represents AI's board.

      • getNumberOfDisks

        public int getNumberOfDisks()
        Returns the number of disks in the game board.
        Returns:
        number of disks

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus()
        Reports the status after attempting to add a disc.
        Returns:
        int status (status of the board).

      • player1Use

        public boolean player1Use(int coord_x,
                          int coord_y)
        Reports if a positions that is being checked was already used by player 1
        Parameters:
        coord_x - x input
        coord_y - y input
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if a specific x,y coordinate has been used by player 1.

      • player2Use

        public boolean player2Use(int coord_x,
                          int coord_y)
        Reports if a positions that is being checked was already used by player 2
        Parameters:
        coord_x - x input
        coord_y - y input
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if a specific x,y coordinate has been used by player 2.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the size of this board.
        Returns:
        an integer indicating the size of the board.
